name: Lear Corporation
description: Lear Corporation is a global leader in automotive seating and electrical systems. Founded in 1917 and headquartered in Southfield, Michigan, Lear designs and manufactures seat systems and electrical distribution systems for major automotive manufacturers worldwide. The company operates through two segments: Seating and E-Systems. Lear's Seating segment is dedicated to developing innovative seating solutions that enhance comfort and safety, while the E-Systems segment focuses on advanced electrical systems and components that support vehicle connectivity and electrification. Lear is committed to sustainability and aims to lead the industry in environmental responsibility, developing products that reduce weight and improve fuel efficiency. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Lear invests in new technologies, including lightweight materials and advanced manufacturing techniques, to meet the evolving needs of the automotive market. The company's mission is to provide superior products that deliver value and enhance the driving experience for consumers around the globe.
